Only available during specific reservation times, and may not be available during holidays or in conjunction with other offers or promotions //cancellation policy
Reserve has access to great tables because we give our restaurant partners peace of mind that our diners will arrive. Once your reservation is confirmed, a restaurant is setting aside a table especially for you. We understand that plans can change, so if you need to change or cancel your reservation, please follow the guidelines and cancellation policy below to avoid being charged a Late Cancellation or Missed Reservation Fee.
